page.title: 02WREXHAM BEAST MARKET
page.content: The beast market is packed with people. Most people have prams and pushchairs and buggies. Some people have lots of bags and especially carrier bags. There are thousands of stalls here not to mention the people who come to look round. Some people buy clothes, others jewellery or shoes. Little children buy toys, books or games. Housewives buy brushes, dish cloths, soap or toilet tissue. The market is very different to Tesco's or Asda. The market is an open market but Tesco's and Asda isn't. There are a lot of food shops here and even ice cream vans and hot dogs etc... We also have a Thursday market now which means that if people want to come to the Monday market but they can't get there, then they might be able to go to the market on a Thursday instead. The Markets are very big.
